blocks.name: csu
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include finite and infinite summations. (An underscore was added to the ASCII token in order to facilitate set.mm text searches, since "sum" is a commonly used word in comments.)
blocks.origin: prop class csu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) { sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1) }

df-sum
blocks.content: Define the sum of a series with an index set of integers ` A ` . ` k ` is normally a free variable in ` B ` , i.e. ` B ` can be thought of as ` B ( k ) ` . This definition is the result of a collection of discussions over the most general definition for a sum that does not need the index set to have a specified ordering. This definition is in two parts, one for finite sums and one for subsets of the upper integers. When summing over a subset of the upper integers, we extend the index set to the upper integers by adding zero outside the domain, and then sum the set in order, setting the result to the limit of the partial sums, if it exists. This means that conditionally convergent sums can be evaluated meaningfully. For finite sums, we are explicitly order-independent, by picking any bijection to a 1-based finite sequence and summing in the induced order. These two methods of summation produce the same result on their common region of definition (i.e. finite sets of integers) by ~ summo . Examples: ` sum_ k e. { 1 , 2 , 4 } ` ` k ` means ` 1 + 2 + 4 = 7 ` , and ` sum_ k e. NN ` ` ( 1 / ( 2 ^ k ) ) = 1 ` means 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ... = 1 ( ~ geoihalfsum ). (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)

  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)

}

blocks.name: sumeq2ii
blocks.content: Equality theorem for sum, with the class expressions ` B ` and ` C ` guarded by ` _I ` to be always sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: cbvsumv
blocks.content: Change bound variable in a sum. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvsumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvsum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvsumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= sum(s1 âˆˆ c0, c2)
  âŠ£ (s0 = s1 â†’ c1 = c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvsum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

thm 2sumeq2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c3))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2), csu(s1, c1, c3), w0)
  sumeq2dv(s1, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  3expa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1)â†’ c2 = c3)

thm sumfc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(csu(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0))), csu(s1, c0, c1), csu(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))), csu(s1, c0, cfv(cid, c1)))
  sumeq2i(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(cid, c1))
  fvmpt2i(s1, c0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  cbvsumi(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  nffvmpt1(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  nfcv(s0, cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cmpt(s1, c0, c1))

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cv(s1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

  sseqtr4d(c0, cfv(cuz, co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cuz, c1), wa(wa(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfz, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))

blocks.name: fsumcvg
blocks.content: The sequence of partial sums of a finite sum converges to the whole sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  climconst(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cfv(cuz, c2), c2, universe, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c2))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzelz(c2, c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  eqcomd(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2))))
  seqid2(hs1, c0, caddc, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cc, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat0), cv(hs1)))
  addid1(cv(hs1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cc))
  ffvelrnd(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, cc, cfv(cuz, c0), w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cuz, c0), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzel2(c2, c0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc, cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc))
  eluzelz(cv(s0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc))
  pm2.61d1(w0, wcel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc))
  eqeltrd(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c4))
  iftrue(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  syl6eqel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc, nat0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), nat0))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(co(c2, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), nat0), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz(cv(hs1), co(c2, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), nat0), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(cz, c3)))
  eldifd(cv(hs1), cz, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  eluzelz(cv(hs1), co(c2, caddc, nat1))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  con2d(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  syl6(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  sseld(cv(hs1), c3, co(c0, cfz, c2), w0)
  fznuz(cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  vtoclga(s0, cv(hs1), cdif(cz, c3), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0))
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1, nat0)
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0, cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cz, c3)))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cz, c3)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc))
  eldifi(cv(s0), cz, c3)
  syl6eqel(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cz, c3)))
  0cn()
  fvmpt2(s0, cz, cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc, c1)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cz, c3)), wceq(cif(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), nat0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  eldifn(cv(s0), cz, c3)
  iffalse(c4, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(nat0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c2))))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cz, c3)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), nat0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(hs1))

}

thm sumrb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, cif(c5, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c4))))

} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))

  simpr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  bitr3d(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2))
  breq1d(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))))

  adantlr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c5, cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), wb(wbr(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), universe))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqex(c3, caddc, c1)
  climres(c0, cseq(c3, caddc, c1), universe, c2)

thm summolem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, cz, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c6, cc))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(c7, cv(s1)), c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c3, cn)))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(cv(s2), co(nat1, cfz, c1), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c7, co(nat1, cfz, c3), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, cz, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), c3))), diffsc(s1, c3))

blocks.name: summo
blocks.content: A sum has at most one limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: zsum
blocks.content: Series sum with index set a subset of the upper integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: isum
blocks.content: Series sum with an upper integer index set (i.e. an infinite series). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  ssidd(c0, w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)=(~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))))
  âŠ£ c0 =(â„¤â‰¥ ` c2)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„¤)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  ssidd(c0, w0)
  eqtr4d((c3 ` s0), if(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1, 0), c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 âˆˆ c0)
}

blocks.content: Any sum over the empty set is zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)

thm sum0(setvar s0, class c0) {

  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, cz))
  a1i(wtru, wss(emptycls, cn))
  0ss(cn)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), nat0, wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1), cn, wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  simpr(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnuz()
  fvconst2(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1), nat0)
  c0ex()
  iffalsei(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cc))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cc))
  noel(cv(s0))
  mp2(wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)))), nat0), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  ax-mp(wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0), wcel(nat1, cz))

blocks.name: fsumss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in a finite sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c2, c1)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2))))
  ex(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c2, c1)))
  sumss(s0, c0, c1, c2, nat0, wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls), wss(c0, c2))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wceq(c1, nat0))
  syl6eqss(c2, cfv(cuz, nat0), emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  0ss(cfv(cuz, nat0))
  expimpd(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c2)), c2)), wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c2, c1)))

thm fsumsers(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c2, cfz, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), w0)
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cuz, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c2))

  eluzel2(c4, c2)
  syl6ss(c0, cfv(cuz, c2), co(c2, cfz, c4), w0)
  fzssuz(c2, c4)
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  fsumcvg2(s0, c2, c3, c4, c0, c1, w0)

blocks.name: fsumser
blocks.content: A finite sum expressed in terms of a partial sum of an infinite series. The recursive definition follows as ~ fsum1 and ~ fsump1i , which should make our notation clear and from which, along with closure ~ fsumcl , we will derive the basic properties of finite sums. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: fsumcl2lem
blocks.content: - Lemma for finite sum closures. (The "-" before "Lemma" forces the math content to be displayed in the Statement List - NM 11-Feb-2008.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2014.)

thm fsumcl2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  necon4bd(c0, emptycls, w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  a1d(w0, wn(wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  expimpd(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))

  sum0(s0, c1)

blocks.name: fsumsplit
blocks.content: Split a sum into two parts. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1)), co(csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), caddc, csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), csu(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), w0)
  oveq12d(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c2, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wss(c2, c0), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c1, cc)), wo(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  sumss2(s0, c2, c0, c1, nat0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c3, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), wss(c3, c0), wral(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cc)), wo(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  olcd(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  sumss2(s0, c3, c0, c1, nat0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, c3)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  elun(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1))
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(c1, caddc, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  addid1d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c2, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c2, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(nat0, caddc, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), nat0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  con2d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sylibr(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))))
  mtbii(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  noel(cv(s0))
  syl5rbbr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3)))
  elin(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3), emptycls, w0)
  imnan(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  addid2d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
}

thm fsumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)=(sum(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(c2 â‹‚ c3)= âˆ…)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 =(c2 â‹ƒ c3))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), (sum(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1)), (sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0))[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0))), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0,(if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0))), w0)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1), caddc, sum(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1)= sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)), c2 âŠ† c0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1 âˆˆ â„‚), (c0 âŠ†(â„¤â‰¥ ` 0)âˆ¨ c0 âˆˆ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  sumss2(s0, c2, c0, c1, nat0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1)= sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)), c3 âŠ† c0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1 âˆˆ â„‚), (c0 âŠ†(â„¤â‰¥ ` 0)âˆ¨ c0 âˆˆ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, w0, c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  olcd(w0, c0 âŠ†(â„¤â‰¥ ` 0), c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  sumss2(s0, c3, c0, c1, nat0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0), if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0), w0)
  sylancl((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)âˆˆ â„‚, c1 âˆˆ â„‚, 0 âˆˆ â„‚)
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, s0 âˆˆ c2)
  sylancl((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)âˆˆ â„‚, c1 âˆˆ â„‚, 0 âˆˆ â„‚)
  0cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, s0 âˆˆ c3)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0))= c1, (s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ¨ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  biimpa(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ¨ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  syl6bb(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ¨ s0 âˆˆ c3), s0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹ƒ c3))
  eleq2d(s0, c0, (c2 â‹ƒ c3), w0)
  elun(s0, c2, c3)
  jaodan(w0, s0 âˆˆ c2, s0 âˆˆ c3, (if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0))= c1)
  eqtrd((if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)), c1, (c1[+]0), (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c2))
  oveq12d(if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0), caddc, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0), c1, nat0, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c2))
  adantl(w0, s0 âˆˆ c2, if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 âˆˆ c2)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c2), s0 âˆˆ c3)
  imp(w0, s0 âˆˆ c2, Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c3)
  addid1d(c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c2))
  syldan(w0, s0 âˆˆ c2, c1 âˆˆ â„‚, s0 âˆˆ c0)

  syl5sseqr(c2, c0, (c2 â‹ƒ c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  eqtrd((if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)), c1, (0[+]c1), (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  oveq12d(if(s0 âˆˆ c2, c1, 0), caddc, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0), nat0, c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3), s0 âˆˆ c2)
  imp(w0, s0 âˆˆ c3, Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c2)
  con2d(w0, s0 âˆˆ c3, s0 âˆˆ c2)
  sylibr(w0, (s0 âˆˆ c2 â†’ Â¬ s0 âˆˆ c3), Â¬(s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  mtbii(w0, (s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3), s0 âˆˆ âˆ…)
  noel(s0)
  syl5rbbr(w0, s0 âˆˆ âˆ…, (s0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3), s0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ c3))
  elin(s0, c2, c3)
  eleq2d(s0, (c2 â‹‚ c3), emptycls, w0)
  imnan(s0 âˆˆ c2, s0 âˆˆ c3)
  adantl(w0, s0 âˆˆ c3, if(s0 âˆˆ c3, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 âˆˆ c3)
  addid2d(c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c3))
  syldan(w0, s0 âˆˆ c3, c1 âˆˆ â„‚, s0 âˆˆ c0)
  sselda(s0, c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, (c2 â‹ƒ c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: fsumsplitf
blocks.content: Split a sum into two parts. A version of ~ fsumsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1)), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), co(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  fsumsplit(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  oveq12i(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csu(s0, c2, c1), csu(s0, c3, c1))
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1, csb(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1a(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  eqtri(csb(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), c1, csb(s0, cv(s0), c1))
  csbco(hs0, s0, cv(s0), c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)

blocks.name: sumsnf
blocks.content: A sum of a singleton is the term. A version of ~ sumsn using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

thm sumsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c3), c2))

  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(nat1, cn))

  csbeq1d(s0, cv(hs0), c3, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, c0, c3), cc, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  csbiegf(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)

  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1))))

thm sumsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c3)= c2)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’ c3 = c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c3), c2, (seq(1(+, { < 1, c2 > }))` 1), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚))
  syl5eq(sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c3), (seq(1(+, { < 1, c2 > }))` 1), sum(hs0 âˆˆ { c0 },[hs0 / s0]c3), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚))

  csbeq1(s0, hs0, ({ < 1, c0 > } ` hs1), c3)
  a1i((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚), 1 âˆˆ â„•)
  sylibr((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚), ({ < 1, c0 > } :(1[...]1)â†” { c0 }), ({ < 1, c0 > } : { 1 } â†” { c0 }))
  sylancr((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚), ({ < 1, c0 > } : { 1 } â†” { c0 }), 1 âˆˆ â„•, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  f1osng(nat1, cn, c0, c1)
  mp2b((({ < 1, c0 > } :(1[...]1)â†” { c0 })â†”({ < 1, c0 > } : { 1 } â†” { c0 })), 1 âˆˆ â„¤, (1[...]1)= { 1 })
  fzsn(nat1)
  f1oeq2((1[...]1), { 1 }, { < 1, c0 > }, { c0 })
  eqeltrd([hs0 / s0]c3, cc, [c0 / s0]c3, ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ { c0 }))
  csbeq1d(s0, hs0, c3, c0, ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ { c0 }))
  adantl((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚), hs0 âˆˆ { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  elsni(hs0, c0)
  eqeltrd([c0 / s0]c3, cc, c2, ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ { c0 }))
  ad2antrr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ â„‚, hs0 âˆˆ { c0 }, [c0 / s0]c3 = c2)
  simplr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ â„‚, hs0 âˆˆ { c0 })
  3eqtr4rd(({ < 1, c2 > } ` hs1), [({ < 1, c0 > } ` hs1)/ s0]c3, [c0 / s0]c3, c2, ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ(1[...]1)))
  ad2antrr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ â„‚, hs1 âˆˆ(1[...]1), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  a1i(c0 âˆˆ c1, F/(s0, c2))
  csbeq1d(s0, ({ < 1, c0 > } ` hs1), c3, c0, ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ(1[...]1)))
  sylan9eqr(({ < 1, c0 > } ` hs1), c0, ({ < 1, c0 > } ` 1), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ â„‚), hs1 âˆˆ(1[...]1))

blocks.name: fsumsplitsn
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite sum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, c3), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplitf(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, c0, csn(c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cc))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(c2, cc), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  elunnel1(cv(s0), c0, csn(c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, cc))
  oveq2d(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, cc))
  sumsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

thm fsumsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2)=(sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[+]c3))
  âŠ£ F/(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ F/(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ c4)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c0)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c1 â†’ c2 = c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c3 âˆˆ â„‚)

  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2), (sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[+]c3), (sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fsumsplitf(s0, (c0 â‹ƒ { c1 }), c2, c0, { c1 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 â‹‚ { c1 })= âˆ…, Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c0)

thm fsum1p(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1), c2)=(c3[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), c2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’ c2 = c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)

} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1), c2), (c3[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), c2)), (sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c2)[+]sum(s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, (c0[...]c1), c2, { c0 }, ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), w0)
  eqtr3d(({ c0 } â‹‚((c0[+]1)[...]c1)), emptycls, ((c0[...]c0)â‹‚((c0[+]1)[...]c1)), w0)
  ineq1d((c0[...]c0), ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), { c0 }, w0)
  syl(w0, ((c0[...]c0)â‹‚((c0[+]1)[...]c1))= âˆ…, c0[<](c0[+]1))
  ltp1d(c0, w0)
  zred(c0, w0)
  fzdisj(c0, (c0[+]1), c0, c1)
  eqtrd((c0[...]c1), ({ c0 } â‹ƒ((c0[+]1)[...]c1)), ((c0[...]c0)â‹ƒ((c0[+]1)[...]c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[...]c1)=((c0[...]c0)â‹ƒ((c0[+]1)[...]c1)), c0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1))
  fzsplit(c0, c0, c1)
  uneq1d((c0[...]c0), ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), { c0 }, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[...]c0)= { c0 }, c0 âˆˆ â„¤)
  fzsn(c0)

  oveq1d(sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c2), caddc, sum(s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]1)[...]c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ { c0 }, c2)= c3, c0 âˆˆ â„¤, c3 âˆˆ â„‚)
  syl(w0, c0 âˆˆ â„¤, c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  eluzel2(c1, c0)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, (c0[...]c1), w0, c3 âˆˆ â„‚, c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c3, s0 = c0)
  ralrimiva(s0, (c0[...]c1), w0, c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  syl(w0, c0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1), c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  eluzfz1(c1, c0)
  sumsn(s0, c0, cz, c3, c2)

blocks.name: fsummsnunz
blocks.content: A finite sum all of whose summands are integers is itself an integer (case where the summation set is the union of a finite set and a singleton). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsummsnunz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), cz))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqel(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), cz, csu(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  fsumzcl(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz)))
  expcom(wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz))
  rspcsbela(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, cz)

blocks.name: fsumsplitsnun
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite sum by splitting the sum into two parts. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)

  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls))

  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cz)))
  expcom(wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cz))
  rspcsbela(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, cz)
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))

  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  oveq2d(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c3), csb(s0, c1, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wceq(csu(s0, csn(c1), c3), csb(s0, c1, c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(csb(s0, c1, c3), cc))

  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))

  rspcsbela(s0, c1, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, cz)

  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))

blocks.name: fsump1
blocks.content: The addition of the next term in a finite sum of ` A ( k ) ` is the current term plus ` B ` i.e. ` A ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsump1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c2), co(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), caddc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))

thm isumclim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2, cfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4)), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4)), c2), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), c2)
}

thm sumnul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))

  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), w0)

  ndmfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli)
}

thm isumrecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

blocks.name: fsump1i
blocks.content: Optimized version of ~ fsump1 for making sums of a concrete number of terms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsump1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c5, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c7, caddc, c6), c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4))
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, co(c5, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c5, caddc, nat1), c1), wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  syl6eleqr(co(c5, caddc, nat1), c1, cfv(cuz, c2), wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  peano2uz(c5, c2)
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4, co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6), co(c7, caddc, c6), w0)
  syl5eq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1)), c3), w0)
  sumeq1i(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3, co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(c2, cfz, c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  fsump1(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  syl6eleq(c5, cfv(cuz, c2), c1, w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c5, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(cuz, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c2, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  sylbir(wceq(cv(s0), co(c5, caddc, nat1)), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2i(cv(s0), c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  oveq1d(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7), wcel(c5, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsump1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c0), c3)= c4))
  âŠ£ c1 =(â„¤â‰¥ ` c2)
  âŠ£ c0 =(c5[+]1)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’ c3 = c6)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c1)â†’ c3 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(c5 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(c7[+]c6)= c4)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c5)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c6)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 âˆˆ c1, sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c0), c3)= c4)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, (c5[+]1), w0)
  syl(w0, (c5[+]1)âˆˆ c1, c5 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c2))
  syl6eleqr((c5[+]1), c1, (â„¤â‰¥ ` c2), c5 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c2))
  peano2uz(c5, c2)
  3eqtrd(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c0), c3), c4, (sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3)[+]c6), (c7[+]c6), w0)
  syl5eq(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c0), c3), (sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3)[+]c6), sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...](c5[+]1)), c3), w0)
  sumeq1i(s0, (c2[...]c0), c3, (c2[...](c5[+]1)))
  oveq2i(c2, cfz, c0, (c5[+]1))
  fsump1(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  syl6eleq(c5, (â„¤â‰¥ ` c2), c1, w0)
  simpld(w0, c5 âˆˆ c1, sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7)
  sylan2(w0, s0 âˆˆ(c2[...](c5[+]1)), c3 âˆˆ â„‚, s0 âˆˆ c1)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c1, (â„¤â‰¥ ` c2), s0 âˆˆ(c2[...](c5[+]1)))
  elfzuz(s0, c2, (c5[+]1))
  sylbir(s0 =(c5[+]1), c3 = c6, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2i(s0, c0, (c5[+]1))
  oveq1d(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3), caddc, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7, c5 âˆˆ c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, (c5[+]1))
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsum2d
blocks.content: Write a double sum as a sum over a two-dimensional region. Note that ` B ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: fsumxp
blocks.content: Combine two sums into a single sum over the cartesian product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3), csu(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), w0)
  fsum2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sumeq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

thm fsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, sum(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2))= sum(s2 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1), c3))
  âŠ£ (s2 = < s0, s1 > â†’ c3 = c2)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, sum(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2)), sum(s2 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1), c3), sum(s2 âˆˆ â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ s0 } Ã— c1)), c3), w0)
  fsum2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  sumeq1i(s2, â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ s0 } Ã— c1)), c3, (c0 Ã— c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } Ã— c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fsumcnv
blocks.content: Transform a region of summation by using the converse operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  fsumf1o(s0, s1, c0, c1, ccnv(c0), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), w0)
  syl6eqr(c1, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))
  csbeq1a(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1))
  syl5eqr(c3, csb(s0, cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), c1), csb(s0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))))

  opeq12(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s3), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(ccnv(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), c0), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  ax-mp(wf1o(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  cnvf1o(hs0, ccnv(c0))
  f1oeq3d(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0, w0)

  eqtrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))

  syl6eq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))

  cnveqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))
  opswap(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))))
  opex(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))
  sumeq2i(s1, ccnv(c0), c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)))
  syl6eqr(c2, csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), c3)), csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2), wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(c2, csb(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), ccnv(c0)), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  1st2nd(ccnv(c0), cv(s1))
  csbeq1a(s1, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), c2)

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)= sum(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2))
  âŠ£ (s0 = < s2, s3 > â†’ c1 = c3)

  syl6eqr(sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), sum(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2), sum(s1 âˆˆ `' c0,[(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3), w0)

  syl6eqr(c1, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, s0 = <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)

  ax-mp(((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 â†” `' `' c0), Rel(`' c0))

  eqtrd(((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })` s1), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>), s1 âˆˆ `' c0)
  fveq2d((hs0 âˆˆ `' c0 â†¦ â‹ƒ `' { hs0 }), s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, s1 âˆˆ `' c0)

  syl(s1 âˆˆ `' c0, c2 =[<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)

blocks.name: fsumcom
blocks.content: Interchange order of summation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, csu(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
}

thm fsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, sum(s1 âˆˆ c1, c2))= sum(s1 âˆˆ c1, sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1))â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ Fin)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c1)â†”(s1 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)))
  ancom(s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1)
}

  zred(cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  elfzelz(cv(s0), nat0, c0)
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))
  elfzle2(cv(s1), nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)), cz))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), nat0, c0)
  zsubcld(c0, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  nn0zd(c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  elfz3nn0(cv(s0), c0)

  elfzelz(cv(s1), nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  elfz5(cv(s0), nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))
}

blocks.name: fsum0diag
blocks.content: Two ways to express "the sum of ` A ( j , k ) ` over the triangular region ` M <_ j ` , ` M <_ k ` , ` j + k <_ N ` ". (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsum0diag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1)), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), w0)
  fzfid(nat0, c0, w0)
  fzfid(nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)
  fsum0diaglem(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, cv(s1))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, cv(s0))
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(0[...]c0), sum(s1 âˆˆ(0[...](c0[-]s0)), c1))= sum(s1 âˆˆ(0[...]c0), sum(s0 âˆˆ(0[...](c0[-]s1)), c1)))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§(s0 âˆˆ(0[...]c0)âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ(0[...](c0[-]s0))))â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)

} = {

  impbii((s0 âˆˆ(0[...]c0)âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ(0[...](c0[-]s0))), (s1 âˆˆ(0[...]c0)âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(0[...](c0[-]s1))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)

blocks.name: mptfzshft

  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))
  ovex(cv(s0), cmin, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  mpbiri(w0, wfn(ccnv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wfn(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  fnmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))
  ovex(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  fneq1d(ccnv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), co(c0, cfz, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), w0)
  mptcnv(s0, hs0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))))

  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))

  zsubcld(cv(s0), c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  eqtr2d(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), caddc, c1, co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  elfzelz(cv(s0), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1))

  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  npcan(cv(s0), c1)
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))))

  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))

blocks.name: fsumrev
blocks.content: Reversal of a finite sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumrev(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

thm fsumshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)

} = {
  fsumf1o(s0, s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), c4, co(cv(s1), cmin, c3), cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), w0)
  fzfid(co(c0, caddc, c3), co(c1, caddc, c3), w0)
  mptfzshft(s0, c0, c3, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(s1), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(s1), cmin, c3)

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4))

  âŠ£ (s0 =(s1[-]c3)â†’ c2 = c4)

  fvmpt(s0, s1, ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), (s0 âˆˆ((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))â†¦(s0[-]c3)), (s1[-]c3), (s0[-]c3))
  oveq1(s0, s1, cmin, c3)

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cmin, cv(s0))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

blocks.name: modfsummod
blocks.content: A finite sum modulo a positive integer equals the finite sum of their summands modulo the positive integer, modulo the positive integer. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm modfsummod(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cz)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mp2and(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn))
  syl(w0, wi(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  findcard2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, wi(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))), wi(wa(wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))), wi(wa(wral(s0, emptycls, wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, emptycls, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, emptycls, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))), wi(wa(wral(s0, cv(hs1), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, cv(hs1), c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, cv(hs1), co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))), wi(wa(wral(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wa(wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2)), wa(wral(s0, emptycls, wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(csu(s0, emptycls, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, emptycls, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn), wral(s0, emptycls, wcel(c1, cz)))
  raleq(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, wcel(c1, cz))
  eqeq12d(co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, emptycls, c1), cmo, c2), co(csu(s0, emptycls, co(c1, cmo, c2)), cmo, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq1d(csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cmo, c2, csu(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)

blocks.name: fsumge0
blocks.content: If all of the terms of a finite sum are nonnegative, so is the sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  fsumcllem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cc))
  sstri(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cc, cr)
  rge0ssre()
  ax-resscn()
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  ge0addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  elrege0(c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  0e0icopnf()
  simprbi(wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  elrege0(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: fsumless
blocks.content: A shorter sum of nonnegative terms is smaller than a longer one. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c2, c1)))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c2, c1), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, csu(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), w0)

}

blocks.name: fsumge1
blocks.content: A sum of nonnegative numbers is greater than or equal to any one of its terms. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumge1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(c0, cle, csu(s0, c1, c2), csu(s0, csn(c3), c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c3), c2), c0), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, cc))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: fsumle
blocks.content: If all of the terms of finite sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  fsumge0(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  resubcld(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  subge0d(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  subge0d(csu(s0, c0, c2), csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)[â‰¤]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1 âˆˆ â„)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c2 âˆˆ â„)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’ c1[â‰¤]c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)[â‰¤]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2), 0[â‰¤](sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, (sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c2[-]c1)), w0)
  fsumge0(s0, c0, (c2[-]c1), w0)
  resubcld(c2, c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  mpbird((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), 0[â‰¤](c2[-]c1), c1[â‰¤]c2)
  subge0d(c2, c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0))
  subge0d(sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: fsumlt
blocks.content: If every term in one finite sum is less than the corresponding term in another, then the first sum is less than the second. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), clt, csu(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), clt, csu(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  rpgt0d(csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  fsumrpcl(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), crp), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), crp)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  difrp(c1, c2)
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  posdifd(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

thm fsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ Fin)

  breqtrd(nat0, clt, (sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1)), sum(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c2[-]c1)), w0)

  fsumrpcl(s0, c0, (c2[-]c1), w0)
  mpbid((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), (c2[-]c1)âˆˆ â„+, c1[<]c2)
  syl2anc((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0), (c1[<]c2 â†”(c2[-]c1)âˆˆ â„+), c1 âˆˆ â„, c2 âˆˆ â„)
  difrp(c1, c2)

}

blocks.name: telfsumo
blocks.content: Sum of a telescoping series, using half-open intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(c2[-]c3))=(c4[-]c5))

  âŠ£ (s1 = c0 â†’ c6 = c4)
  âŠ£ (s1 = c1 â†’ c6 = c5)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1))â†’ c6 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)

} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(c2[-]c3))=(c4[-]c5), c1 = c0, c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ `(c0[+]1)))
  3eqtr4d(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(c2[-]c3)), (c4[-]c5), sum(s0 âˆˆ âˆ…,(c2[-]c3)), (c4[-]c4), (w0 âˆ§ c1 = c0))

blocks.name: telfsumo2
blocks.content: Sum of a telescoping series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm telfsumo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfzo, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(c4, cmin, c5)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c6, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c6, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c6, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c6, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(csu(s0, co(c0, cfzo, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(c4, cmin, c5), csu(s0, co(c0, cfzo, c1), co(cneg(c3), cmin, cneg(c2))), co(cneg(c5), cmin, cneg(c4)), w0)
  telfsumo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cneg(c3), cneg(c2), cneg(c5), cneg(c4), cneg(c6), w0)
  negeqd(c6, c3, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  negeqd(c6, c2, wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  negeqd(c6, c5, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  negeqd(c6, c4, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  negcld(c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1))))
  sumeq2dv(s0, co(c0, cfzo, c1), co(cneg(c3), cmin, cneg(c2)), co(c2, cmin, c3), w0)
  neg2subd(c3, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfzo, c1))))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfzo, c1)), wcel(c3, cc), wral(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), wcel(c6, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  elfzofz(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  rspccva(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), cv(s0), wcel(c6, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  eleq1d(c6, cc, c3, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfzo, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wral(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), wcel(c6, cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  fzofzp1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  rspccva(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), wcel(c6, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  eleq1d(c6, cc, c2, wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  neg2subd(c5, c4, w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c0, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0, wcel(c5, cc), wcel(c6, cc))
  eleq1d(c6, cc, c5, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz1(c1, c0)
  rspcdva(s1, c1, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0, wcel(c4, cc), wcel(c6, cc))
  eleq1d(c6, cc, c4, wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  ralrimiva(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0, wcel(c6, cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz2(c1, c0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c6)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c2)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c5)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfzo, c1)
  diff.cfzo.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, cc)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cc)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c5, cc)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c4, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
}

thm telfsumo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(c2[-]c3))=(c4[-]c5))
  âŠ£ (s1 = s0 â†’ c6 = c3)
  âŠ£ (s1 =(s0[+]1)â†’ c6 = c2)
  âŠ£ (s1 = c0 â†’ c6 = c5)
  âŠ£ (s1 = c1 â†’ c6 = c4)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1))â†’ c6 âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c6)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c5)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(c2[-]c3)), (c4[-]c5), sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[..^]c1),(-u(c3)[-]-u(c2))), (-u(c5)[-]-u(c4)), w0)
  telfsumo(s0, s1, c0, c1, -u(c3), -u(c2), -u(c5), -u(c4), -u(c6), w0)
  negeqd(c6, c3, s1 = s0)
  negeqd(c6, c2, s1 =(s0[+]1))
  negeqd(c6, c5, s1 = c0)
  negeqd(c6, c4, s1 = c1)
  negcld(c6, (w0 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ(c0[...]c1)))

thm fsumre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))

} = {

  ref()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cre, cc, cr, cc)
  readd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

}

blocks.name: fsumo1
blocks.content: The finite sum of eventually bounded functions (where the index set ` B ` does not depend on ` x ` ) is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2016.)

blocks.name: o1fsum
blocks.content: If ` A ( k ) ` is O(1), then ` sum_ k <_ x , A ( k ) ` is O( ` x ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-May-2016.)

blocks.name: seqabs
blocks.content: Generalized triangle inequality: the absolute value of a finite sum is less than or equal to the sum of absolute values. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqabs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr3d(cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), cfv(cabs, csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), w0)
  fsumabs(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), w0)
  fzfid(c0, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), w0)
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), c3, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cc), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  abscl(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c2)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
}

  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(abs `(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2))[â‰¤](seq(c0(+, c3))` c2))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c2 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2))â†’(c1 ` s0)âˆˆ â„‚)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2))â†’(c3 ` s0)=(abs `(c1 ` s0)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr3d((abs `(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)), cle, (seq(c0(+, c3))` c2), (abs ` sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2),(c1 ` s0))), sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2),(abs `(c1 ` s0))), w0)
  fsumabs(s0, (c0[...]c2), (c1 ` s0), w0)
  fzfid(c0, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, sum(s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2),(c1 ` s0)), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2), w0)
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, (c1 ` s0), c1, w0)
  eqidd((c1 ` s0), (w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2)))
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, (abs `(c1 ` s0)), c3, w0)
  syl((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ(c0[...]c2)), (abs `(c1 ` s0))âˆˆ â„‚, (c1 ` s0)âˆˆ â„‚)
  recnd((abs `(c1 ` s0)), (c1 ` s0)âˆˆ â„‚)
